body_html: It should be some time in February. @apaszke, I don't think having them coexist is that difficult - there's no harm in having dilation parameter in convolution routines for v5, as long as it is always 1:-). Other changes are minimal. I'll work on a modified PR.
body_text: It should be some time in February. @apaszke, I don't think having them coexist is that difficult - there's no harm in having dilation parameter in convolution routines for v5, as long as it is always 1:-). Other changes are minimal. I'll work on a modified PR.
body: It _should_ be some time in February. @apaszke, I don't think having them coexist is that difficult - there's no harm in having dilation parameter in convolution routines for v5, as long as it is always 1:-). Other changes are minimal. I'll work on a modified PR.
